formal_name:
LEGO® Ninjago™: Shadow
of Ronin™ Update Ver. 2.0
description: This is an update for the LEGO® Ninjago™: Shadow of Ronin™ game. This download does not contain the full version of the title. In order to use this update, you must have the full version of LEGO® Ninjago™: Shadow of Ronin™.
name:
LEGO® Ninjago™: Shadow
of Ronin™ Update Ver. 2.0
disclaimer:
You may need to upgrade your current SD Card to a compatible SDHC Card or microSDHC Card with enough available space to download this software.
Visit support.nintendo.com for information about storage options. Sold separately.
